events.message: I received my order last week but the product was not what I expected and I want to request a refund immediately.
The issue has been identified as a refund request due to dissatisfaction with the purchased product.
A customer service agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for this order.
Hello! Thank you for contacting support. I understand you’d like to request a refund for your recent purchase. I’m here to help.
Could you please provide your order number and explain the reason why you want to return the product?
The order number is 123456789. The product did not match the description on your website and I am very disappointed.
We apologize for the inconvenience. We can process a full refund once the product is returned. We will send you a prepaid return label.
Thank you for the quick response. I appreciate the prepaid return label and will send the product back as soon as possible.
We have received the returned product and your refund has been processed. You should see the amount credited to your account soon.
Just checking in to ensure everything went smoothly with your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since your refund has been successfully processed and there are no further questions, we are closing this case now.
